thread.title: German court backs city bans on diesel cars

title: German court backs city bans on diesel cars
text:
German court backs city bans on diesel cars 10:18am EST - 01:04 
A top German court ruled on Tuesday in favor of allowing major cities to ban heavily polluting diesel cars, a move likely to hit the value of 12 million vehicles in Europe's largest car market and force carmakers to pay for costly modifications.
